infodynamics.measures.mixed

Interface ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSymbolic

    public interface ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete
    A conditional mutual information calculator between a joint set of continuous variables, and a discrete variable, conditioned on another discrete variable.

    These calculators are EXPERIMENTAL -- not properly tested, and not well documented. The intended calling pattern is similar to ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate

    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
